issueMessages.notEmpty: The VAT Identifcation Number is mandatory.
The Taxable person name is mandatory.

issueMessages.disallowedValue: Value not allowed for legal form field.

hasOSSRegistration.label: Are you registered in OSS Union special scheme?

issueMessages.ossNumberFilledAndCheckBoxHasRegisteredI: If you indicated your identifier in OSS Union special scheme, you must confirm this field.

ossNumber.label: If yes, what is your identifer in OSS Union scheme?

issueMessages.ossNumberMandatoryIfHasRegisteredInOSS: If it is indicated that you have an identifier in OSS Union special scheme, you must indicate which one

memberStatesOfExemption.title: Member State(s) in which you intend to avail yourself of exemption
memberStatesOfExemption.label: Member State(s) of exemption

issueMessages.minSize: You must indicate at least one state where you want to benefit from the exemption.
issueMessages.disallowedValue: The exemption member state code is invalid.

TotalValueOfSuppliesByTaxablePerson.title: Total value of supplies carried out by the taxable person

currCalendar.label: Total value of supplies carried out during the current calendar year

issueMessages.disallowedValue: The member state code is invalid.

prevCalendar.label: Total value of supplies carried out during the previous calendar year

issueMessages.disallowedValue: The member state code is invalid.

priorYearToPrevCalendar.label: Total value of supplies carried out during the calendar year prior to previous calendar year

issueMessages.disallowedValue: The member state code is invalid.

identifiedInOtherMS.label: By ticking this box, I declare that I am not already identifed by an individual number in another Member State of establishment for the application of the exemption pursuant to Article 284 (3)(b) of Directive 2006/112/EC.
